topic.title: What's new in Release 12.3
topic.p: Please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 12.3.

section.title: Migrate your plan
section.p: You can now export and import your plan among different Mingle Plus instances.

section.title: Auto-sync feedback
section.p: When you apply or modify your auto-sync filter, you’ll now see a spinner until the objective work count ratio is updated so you get the most accurate and up-to-date information about your objective.

section.title: Daily history chart improvements
section.p: We have optimized when we re-generate the daily history chart cache to improve your chart viewing experience.

section.title: New pie chart
section.p: We’ve converted our pie charts from Chart Director to High Charts to improve our UI aesthetic and to provide the foundation for future chart enhancements.

section.title: End of Life of Mingle API Version 1
section.p: With Mingle 12.3, ThoughtWorks Studios will no longer provide support for Version 1 of the Mingle API. If you are currently using Version 1 of the API, you will need to update to Version 2. If you are using our latest APIs, you do not need to make any changes.
For more information about this change, please see our related community post.

section.title: Bug Fixes
section.p: The following bugs have been fixed with 12.3:

bullets.item: Table query and chart rendering errors if the card contains "<=" symbol in the description
Inability to run Mingle as root
Fail to install Mingle with an empty database
Card name with a quote will result in a 503 (service unavailable)
Mingle server script returns wrong server status
Large card defaults can overrun URL size limits
Turning on property indexing will cause ActiveMQ to fill and fail
